a11y.notes: Form should have accessible labels for all inputs
Label must be associated with input via htmlFor/id
Label must be associated with input via htmlFor/id

Input.description: A versatile input component supporting multiple types (text, email, password, etc.) with validation states and accessibility features.
features: Multiple input types (text, email, password, number, tel, url)
Accessible by default with ARIA attributes

a11y.notes: Must have associated label. Use aria-invalid for error states. Use aria-describedby for helper text.
Use Input with type='password' or dedicated PasswordInput component if available

PasswordInput.note: Use Input with type='password' or dedicated PasswordInput component if available

a11y.notes: Must have associated label. Use aria-checked for state.
Requires SelectTrigger, SelectValue, SelectContent, SelectItem. Must have accessible label.
Must have associated label. Use aria-checked for state.
Must have associated label. Use aria-invalid for error states.

variants.name: solid
variants.description: Primary action button with solid background

variants.name: outline
variants.description: Secondary action button with outline border

variants.name: ghost
variants.description: Tertiary action button with transparent background

Button.description: A versatile button component with multiple variants and sizes. Supports keyboard navigation and accessibility features.

a11y.notes: Keyboard navigable (Enter/Space). Must have accessible text or aria-label. Use aria-disabled for disabled state.

Card.description: A flexible card component for displaying content with header, body, and footer sections. Perfect for organizing related information.

a11y.notes: Requires CardHeader, CardTitle, CardContent, CardFooter. Use aria-labelledby for title association.

Tabs.description: A tabbed interface component for organizing content into multiple panels. Supports keyboard navigation and accessibility features.
features: Full keyboard navigation (Arrow keys, Home, End)
Accessible by default with ARIA attributes

a11y.notes: Requires TabsList, TabsTrigger, TabsContent. Use aria-controls to associate triggers with content.
Must have aria-controls pointing to associated TabsContent
Must have aria-labelledby pointing to associated TabsTrigger
Requires TableHeader, TableBody, TableRow, TableHead, TableCell. Use scope="col" for header cells.

Table.note: Requires TableHeader, TableBody, TableRow, TableHead, TableCell

a11y.notes: Use aria-label for screen reader text if badge text is not descriptive
MetricCard displays key performance indicators. When clickable, ensure keyboard navigation and proper focus management.
ActivityFeed displays a chronological list of activities. Ensure proper ARIA live regions for dynamic updates.
QuickActions provides quick access to common actions. Ensure keyboard navigation and proper ARIA labels.
FilterBar provides filter controls. Ensure proper form labels and keyboard navigation.
Chart displays data visualizations. Ensure proper alt text or aria-label describing the chart data.
Hero section should have clear heading hierarchy and accessible CTAs

examples.tsx: <HeroSection title="Welcome" description="Build amazing experiences" primaryCTA={{label: "Get Started", href: "/signup"}} />

a11y.notes: Feature grid should have clear headings and accessible feature descriptions
Stats should be clearly labeled and accessible
Testimonials should have proper attribution and be accessible
FAQ should use proper heading hierarchy and accessible accordion controls

examples.tsx: <FAQSection title="FAQ" items={[{question: "What is this?", answer: "A design system"}]} />

a11y.notes: CTA section should have clear call-to-action buttons with accessible labels

examples.tsx: <CTASection title="Get Started" description="Start building today" primaryCTA={{label: "Sign Up", href: "/signup"}} />

a11y.notes: Widget container should have accessible title and controls
Dashboard widgets should be organized and accessible

examples.tsx: <DashboardWidgets widgets={[{id: "1", type: "metric", content: <MetricCard title="Users" value="100" />}]} columns={12} />

compare-3.description: Compare 3 options with cards and comparison matrix

recommendation.description: Ranked list of options with justification

tradeoffs.description: Compare options across multiple dimensions (cost, risk, time)

review-confirm.description: Review summary with hard action requiring confirmation
